commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 96 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!

message.body: We have a Discord server and there is currently a poll up for which game to be played after this (Date TBD), the options are: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past (Super NES) (Previously tied with Chrono Trigger), Final Fantasy 6 (Super NES) (known as Final Fantasy 3 in North America) and Final Fantasy (NES), you can vote for more than one option, Discord server link here: https://discord.gg/yHETNuZCUK

commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 107 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!
